name: gxkb
body:
### Description
It shows a flag of current keyboard in a systray area and allows you to switch to another one. It's written in C and uses the GTK library (no GNOME is needed)

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with gxkb? Sent bug report to the [issue tracker](https://github.com/zen-tools/gxkb/issues) and Iâ€™ll help you.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
